name: Gazing Eclipse
description:
You wake up  in a daze, finding must of your fleet had crashed on one of Saturns moons Rhea. Without constant radiation from the sun because of a permanent eclipse , you must journey around the moon gathering all of your gear back. 

Some sounds and other things might be missing, had to rush a little on this project. Will be patching those soon!

Created during Metroidvania Month 18 game jam!           Solo developed! 

Controls 

Jump - Space Bar

Boost - Left Shift

Left Click - Fire

Right Click - ADS

To regenerate your shields, ammo, and abilities you need to touch lingering radiation.(Blue spheres with a generator in the middle)
